column5: Staying down near Neepwa island on Minnitaki with my family in early July. They want a beach area where they can hang out and relax during the day. Has anyone seen any beach areas near there or are they all underwater? Ruby island? Thanks
Not many beaches showing anywhere in NWO.

On the southwest side of Neepawa, there is a cabin and dock - think it may be private - never see any boats there over the years. But when the water isn't up 8 or more feet, like it was a few weeks ago, I believe there is a sort of beach facing due west, I think. Check it out on Google Earth.Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
Looks good. Im more curious if anyone has been down in that area and has seen any beach area this year, or if its all underwater.
This is Ruby Island 3 weeks ago. It looks like water has dropped about 18‚Äù since then (unscientific webcam observations)
Edgpa, thanks for the pic. That is incredibly high. Not going to find much beach area if it stays like that. We leave in two weeks. With some luck the lake level will drop.
Share your pics when you get back!
